About Me

I am a Senior Full Stack Developer with over 5 years of experience in developing high-performance web applications. Based in Quito, Ecuador, I specialize in creating robust and scalable solutions using modern technologies and best practices.

Throughout my career, I've worked with various companies to deliver exceptional results, consistently improving performance, user experience, and business outcomes. My expertise spans across full-stack development, with a particular focus on PHP, Laravel, and modern JavaScript frameworks.

I am passionate about writing clean, maintainable code and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and development practices. My goal is to help businesses achieve their objectives through innovative technical solutions.
